title: Sondiko Kitchen Blow Torch with Fuel Gauge S907, Refillable Soldering Torch Lighter with Safety Lock and Adjustable Flame for Desserts, Creme Brulee, Welding, Industrial (Butane Not Included)

features: One-handed Operation: The flame regulator and flame lock button are in the reach of your thumb, enabling you to easily adjust and lock the flame with only one hand, no need to free the other hand to assist in the operation, providing convenience for cooking like BBQ.

Premium Fuel Gauge: Sondiko cooking torch is equipped with a transparent fuel gauge on the bottom, enabling you to know the remaining gas at any time and thus better manage your cooking creation. What’s more, the easy-to-read fuel gauge with MAX line also functions as a reminder to avoid overfilling. 10g large fuel gas capacity lasts 20-50 minutes each full refill with stable performance, easy handling your delicious feast.

Fit ALL Small Butane Tanks: Do not know what butane gas tank to buy? Or have no idea whether the butane canister at home does not fit our torch? Don’t worry, Sondiko cooking torch fits any brand of butane gas with whether long nozzle or short nozzle! For butane tank with long nozzle, refill the torch directly; for gas tank with short nozzle, add the red adapter included in the box to lengthen the nozzle, then refill the torch.

Versatile Culinary Torch: Up to 1371℃/2500℉ temperature with adjustable flame, this multipurpose cooking blow torch is not just a kitchen torch for baking, sous vide, searing meat and BBQ it also works for soldering, crafting, jewelry DIY and camping.

Adjustable Flame and Continuously Flame Mode: Piezo Ignition Technology allows for using at any angle even upside down with effortless one hand operation, adjustable temperature regulator for complete control of flame and allows flame temperature to reach up to 1371 °C/2500 °F. Press the button to light fire, turn the safety lock clockwise at the same time, then it will keep firing without your pressing. Baking Cooking is more easier
